entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoussac
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.5°C

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
